description:
Welcome to the heart of what I do—documenting unforgettable wedding celebrations across Boston, Massachusetts, and beyond. This is where you’ll find full wedding galleries featuring real couples, real emotions, and a whole lot of personality. As a Boston wedding photographer, I specialize in capturing the candid, unposed moments that make your day uniquely yours—whether it's a big city celebration, a laid-back backyard wedding, or a modern ceremony at an art museum.

In this collection, you’ll see everything from romantic first looks and tearful vows to hilarious toasts and packed dance floors. I’ve photographed weddings at some of the most iconic Massachusetts wedding venues, including DeCordova Sculpture Park and Museum, Cambridge City Hall, the State Room, and more. You’ll also find intimate micro weddings and LGBTQ+ weddings that prove love doesn’t have to follow any rules to be beautiful.

These posts aren’t just pretty pictures—they’re full of helpful inspiration for planning your own wedding day, choosing your dream venue, and getting a feel for what it’s like to work with a photographer who’s all about genuine connection and great energy. So whether you're in the early stages of planning or just here for the love stories, you’re in the right place.
name: Weddings
